system.description: Voidborn Mastery: The Void-Master has spent their entire life aboard starships, mastering the intricacies of void travel and ship operations. Whether guiding a vessel through treacherous asteroid fields or coordinating devastating broadsides, they possess an almost supernatural connection to their ship. This innate understanding allows them to push vessels beyond their normal capabilities.
system.benefit: Choose one specialty at character creation: Mastery of Space (reroll all failed Starship Manoeuvre Action Tests) or Mastery of Gunnery (reroll all failed Starship Shooting Action Tests).
system.notes: Choose at creation: reroll failed Manoeuvre tests OR reroll failed Shooting tests

specialAbilities.name: Master of the Void
specialAbilities.description:
Choose one at character creation:
• Mastery of Space: Reroll all failed Tests for Starship Manoeuvre Actions.
• Mastery of Gunnery: Reroll all failed Tests for Starship Shooting Actions.
